content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Zero Trust Secure Access On-premises Gateway Version 1.0.38 March 11, 2024—ZTSA On-Premises Gateway Version 1.0.38 provides enhanced security and connectivity features. This update includes the following changes: New Feature Supports bypass authentication by endpoint IPs in On-premises Gateways © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated.
